Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What are you doing in my house? Did you
get lost on your way to the clothing shop
next door?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello there. Felt like a stroll in the rain,
did you?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello there! Always happy to see a
traveler in Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0>Are you one of those who came to see
the new <clr:0000>Cece fashion line<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Not to brag, but the mind behind it is
my own daughter Cece!<sp:0:4:0>If you're looking for her...
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hello there! Always happy to see a
traveler in Hateno Village.<sp:0:4:0>Are you one of those who came to see
the new <clr:0000>Cece fashion line<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait,<sp:5:0:0> that hat! There you go!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Not to brag, but the mind behind it is my
own daughter Cece.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0401>Whaddaya mean, we don't look alike?<sp:5:0:0>
Not so! There's a strong resemblance
around the eyebrows, see?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Anyway, I know she's all about glamour,
but she's a good kid at heart. Hope to see
you at <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the general store, <clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff>. They
have all sorts of things, mostly harvested
right here in Hateno Village!<sp:0:4:0>It's good stuff, but don't get too attached
or you'll never want to leave!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>This is the boutique <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>It's the only store that carries <clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff>
clothes, made by my own daughter Cece!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is the dyer, <clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>. Like the
man says, if you've gotta dye somewhere,
it might as well be in Hateno!<sp:0:4:0>The owner will treat you right. Bring him
some clothes and he can make them
whatever color you please.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Just try not to get too hung up on first impressions.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I keep watch over the children <clr:0000>on their
way to school<clr:ffff> here every single day.<sp:0:4:0>It's not my job, mind you. More like
volunteering to help my community!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm? What am I doing, you ask?<sp:0:4:0>This is the road to the <clr:0000>Hateno School <clr:ffff>they
just founded.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Come rain or shine, I stand here and make
sure the kids are safe coming and going.<sp:0:4:0>It's not my job, mind you. More like
volunteering to help my community!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The store owner's a solid member of the
community. Ol' <clr:0000>Pruce <clr:ffff>can tell you all sorts
of things if you ask!
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Be sure to shop <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>, run by
my girls Cece and Sophie!
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hear tell he's expanded the operation
lately. They don't just dye clothes at
<clr:0000>Kochi Dye Shop<clr:ffff>, but <clr:0000>other things<clr:ffff> too!
Talk_27: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, have you been by our store yet?
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sure, no one's heading to or from school
right now, but there's no such thing as
rest for an old man on patrol.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll probably find her at that clothing
shop. <sp:5:1:0>I mean, boutique.
Talk_30:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Not sure what the difference is, personally, but Cece
always gets upset when I call it a clothing shop.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you been by the clothing storeâ€”
I mean, the boutique <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>It's right by the entrance to the village!
If you get lost, look for the big <clr:0000>mushroom-
clothing sculpture<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Since my girls, Cece and Sophie, keep a
tight ship at the...at the boutique, I've
had a lot more free time.<sp:0:4:0>So I pass the time by giving travelers
a little tour around the shops. It beats
working!
Talk_31:
Were you looking to do business inside
this shop here?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey...<sp:5:0:0> I know that Cece hat!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have a limited-edition Cece-brand
piece, you must be a VIP at our store.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>In which case, thanks a bunch for being
a good customer at <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>My darling girls, Cece and Sophie, are
always there to assist you whenever you
need a new outfit!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll probably find her at that clothing
shop. <sp:5:1:0>I mean, boutique. It's over by the
village entrance.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's right! Believe it or not, my girl
<clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> is running in the mayoral election!<sp:0:4:0>If she wins, she'll be picking up a lot of
responsibilities around here.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I hope she'll still have time for her father...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You again, eh? <sp:5:0:0>Ho ho...<sp:5:0:0>are you that
curious about an old man's house?<sp:0:4:0>I don't mind chatting, but it's my time to
nap so I'm rested for the night watch.<sp:0:4:0>If you've got nothing else to do with
yourself, I recommend window shopping
at the clothing boutique next door!
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>Too bad they don't really make clothes
in my size.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>What's a guy gotta do? Beg his own daughter to
expand the line a little?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I can't help but brag, so bear with me.<sp:0:4:0>You might know already, but my girl
Cece ran for mayor of Hateno Village
in the election we just held.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm proud of Cece and Sophie for caring
so much about our village.<sp:0:4:0>So proud, in fact, that it still brings a
tear to my eye to think about it!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>The boutique <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff> is right by
the village entrance! If you get lost, look
for the big <clr:0000>mushroom-clothing sculpture<clr:ffff>.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The whole village is buzzing about the
mayoral election.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>My girl <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> looks to be in the lead,
but Reede, the incumbent mayor, has
done a lot for me over the years.<sp:0:4:0>Not sure how to feel about all
this, personally...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I never imagined we'd even need anything
like a mayoral election out here.<sp:0:4:0>And for my own daughter to run as a
candidate...<sp:5:0:0> Life's just full of surprises!
Hoh ho ho!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My, you're up early. Well, the early Cucco
gets the worm, so they say.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hate to be rude, but I need to rest up for
my patrol tonight.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sleep>I patrolled today...and I'll patrol
tomorrow too... Zzz...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hello there. No rest for the weary, eh?<sp:0:4:0>I know how that goes. I stay up watching
over the community at night.
